definition: body of the deceased (esp. in the context of paying one's respects)/picture of the deceased
to lose/to leave behind/to omit/to bequeath/sth lost/involuntary discharge (of urine etc)

sentences.english: In the red mausoleum, Lenin people visit every day the dead looks.
sentences.chinese: 在紅場裏的列寧陵墓，每天都有民衆瞻仰其遺容。
